title: ALL SOLD 1895 Mayo N300 Anson Nichols Rusie
author: piecesofthegame

posts.post_title: ALL SOLD 1895 Mayo N300 Anson Nichols Rusie
posts.post_content:
So I’m coming to the conclusion that I won’t have the patience to put together this set. So offering these three to the forum. Not really interested in trades (except perhaps an n162 Anson). Plenty of Net54 references. Price is net to me via PayPal.

Anson—Front displays beautifully, no creases, clear image. Low grade due to scrapbook removal/some paper loss on back. But hey, it’s a blank,black back so you’re not missing much. You probably won’t find this quality of front eye appeal at this price point…SOLD

Rusie—Nice lower grade card with decent eye appeal…SOLD

Nichols—Solid image , corner chipping but decent eye appeal…
SOLD
